product_name: Sugoi Sakura Bike Jersey - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Add a burst of color to your ride with the Sugoi Sakura bike jersey. The combination of smooth, moisture-wicking fabric and bright blue floral graphics lets you look and feel your best in the saddle. Lightweight, breathable stretch polyester fabric dries quickly and wicks moisture away from your skin so you stay comfortable even if you start to sweat. Partial-zip opening allows immediate ventilation; droptail hem with elastic gripper ensures full coverage while in the riding position. Sugoi Sakura bike jersey features 3 elastic rear pockets, making it easy to store items such as energy gel, credit card arnd spare tube. Closeout.
short_description: Add a burst of color to your ride with the Sugoi Sakura bike jersey. The combination of smooth, moisture-wicking fabric and bright blue floral graphics lets you look and feel your best in the saddle.
